597790.name: Poor Mouse
597790.description:
Poor Mouse is a great Platforming adventure 8 years in the making. You don't want to miss this one when it finally comes out.
Saddle up, partner! In this action-packed 3D platformer, you'll navigate a sprawling Wild West landscape filled with perilous obstacles, ruthless outlaws, and hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

Gameplay Features:

1. High-Octane Platforming: Get ready to scurry, leap, and glide through the dusty trails of the Wild West. Precise platforming skills are a must as you navigate treacherous terrain, avoid cunning traps, and conquer daunting jumps.

2. Rootin' Tootin' Combat: The Wild West isn't all tumbleweeds and sunsets. Show those pesky varmints who's boss with your trusty tail! Engage in exhilarating shootouts, outsmart monsters, and restore law and order to the frontier.

3. Collectible Craze: Seek out hidden collectibles scattered throughout the Wild West landscape. From shiny gold nuggets to delicious berries, these treasures are your ticket to upgrading your gear and unlocking new abilities.

4. Enthralling Wild West World: Immerse yourself in a beautifully detailed Wild West environment, complete with dusty ghost towns, perilous canyons, and bustling saloons. Each location offers a unique challenge and breathtaking scenery.

5. Gripping Storyline: Unearth the mysteries of the Wild West as you follow an engaging narrative filled with twists, turns, and unexpected alliances.

6. Achievements and Leaderboards: Compete with friends and players worldwide for the top spot on the leaderboards and unlock a range of challenging achievements.
597790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
